trans-unit.source: Represents the context for the trust manager to consider when making the decision to run an application, and when setting up the security on a new <see cref="T:System.AppDomain" /> in which to run an application.
For a list of initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerContext> class, see the <xref:System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerContext.%23ctor> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如需 <xref:System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerContext> 類別之執行個體的初始屬性值清單，請參閱 <xref:System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerContext.%23ctor> 建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerContext" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerContext" /> class.
The following table shows the initial property values for a new instance of the <xref:System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerContext> class.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示的新執行個體的初始屬性值<xref:System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerContext>類別。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Initial value
trans-unit.target: Initial value

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerUIContext" /> values that specifies the type of trust manager user interface to use.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerContext" /> class using the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerUIContext" /> object.

This constructor initializes the properties to the same settings as the default constructor, with the exception of the <xref:System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerContext.UIContext%2A> property, which is set to the value that is passed in.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式將屬性初始化為預設建構函式的相同設定例外<xref:System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerContext.UIContext%2A>屬性設定為傳遞的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the application security manager should ignore any persisted decisions and call the trust manager.
<see langword="true" /> to call the trust manager; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 若要呼叫信任管理員。否則， <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If `true`, the <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationSecurityManager> ignores persisted decisions for the application and calls the trust manager.
trans-unit.target: 如果`true`、<xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationSecurityManager>忽略應用程式保存的決策，並呼叫信任管理員。

trans-unit.source: If `false`, the <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationSecurityManager> uses cached decisions, if available.
trans-unit.target: 如果`false`、<xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationSecurityManager>會使用快取的決策，如果有的話。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the trust manager should cache state for this application, to facilitate future requests to determine application trust.
<see langword="true" /> to cache state data; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 快取狀態資料。否則， <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This flag is set to `true` if the host might call the trust manager numerous times for trust decisions for this application.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定此旗標`true`如果主機可能呼叫信任管理員多次此應用程式信任決策。

trans-unit.source: If `true`, the trust manager should cache any state that might improve the speed of future calls to the <xref:System.Security.Policy.IApplicationTrustManager.DetermineApplicationTrust%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果`true`，信任管理員應該快取可能會改善速度，日後呼叫的任何狀態<xref:System.Security.Policy.IApplicationTrustManager.DetermineApplicationTrust%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This property is set to `false` if the host does not expect to call the trust manager again for the current <xref:System.AppDomain>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性設定為`false`如果主機不會預期一次目前呼叫信任管理員<xref:System.AppDomain>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the trust manager should prompt the user for trust decisions.
<see langword="true" /> to not prompt the user; <see langword="false" /> to prompt the user.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 不提示使用者。<see langword="false" />提示使用者。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If `false`, the trust manager determines the appropriate user dialog to obtain a trust decision.
trans-unit.target: 如果`false`，信任管理員會決定適當的使用者 對話方塊，以取得信任決策。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user's response to the consent dialog should be persisted.
<see langword="true" /> to cache state data; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 快取狀態資料。否則， <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is `true` if the user’s response to the consent dialog should be persisted to avoid further prompting the user with each new activation request.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是`true`如果使用者的回應同意對話方塊應持續以避免進一步提示使用者與每個新的啟用要求。

trans-unit.source: This property is `false` if the user’s response should not be persisted.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是`false`如果不應保存使用者回應。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the identity of the previous application identity.
An <see cref="T:System.ApplicationIdentity" /> object representing the previous <see cref="T:System.ApplicationIdentity" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ApplicationIdentity" />物件，代表先前<see cref="T:System.ApplicationIdentity" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of user interface the trust manager should display.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerUIContext" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerUIContext" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerUIContext.Run" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerUIContext.Run" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerContext.UIContext%2A> property is intended to recommend the user interface the trust manager should provide for the trust decision.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerContext.UIContext%2A>屬性要建議使用者介面，信任管理員應該提供信任決策。

trans-unit.source: A trust manager can decide to use a different interface.
trans-unit.target: 信任管理員可以決定要使用不同的介面。
